alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:21PM CDT until March 12 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR JASPER...NORTHEASTERN SIMPSON AND CENTRAL SMITH COUNTIES... At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pineville, or 13 miles northwest of Stringer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Bay Springs around 430 PM CDT. Turnerville around 435 PM CDT. Paulding around 445 PM CDT. Orange around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sylvarena and Louin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
